raw_body: It is with profound sadness and grief we inform the demise of Dr. Kandasamy Ponnusamy born in Valvettithurai, Jaffna and lived in Colombo. He is the loving son of late Kandasamy and his wife Nawaratnam and loving son-in- law of late Sangarathas and his wife Pachchiyaluxmy, beloved husband of Dr. Arunthathy and beloved father of Raguwaren. he is the loving brother of late Nanthini and Dr. Thayalini, loving brother-in-law of Varatharajan, late Kesa
